import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./CriteriaSection.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CriteriaSection(){const[criterios,setCriterios]=useState([]);// Busca os critérios ao carregar o componente
useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:3001/api/criterios').then(response=>{setCriterios(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error("Houve um erro ao buscar os critérios:",error);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"criteria-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"info-text",children:"Crit\xE9rios para sele\xE7\xE3o das marcas"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"subinfo",children:"Confira os par\xE2metros para nossa lista das melhores marcas de colch\xF5es"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"criteria-list",children:criterios.map(criterio=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"criteria-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"criteria-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://bfbaby.com.br/up/icon-criterio.png",alt:"\xCDcone crit\xE9rio",className:"criteria-icon"}),criterio.title]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"criteria-description",children:criterio.description})]},criterio.id))})]});}export default CriteriaSection;
